trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were no other sightings in Nashville on or around June 8th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsit glowed and looked to big very large as it was a couple of miles away. It seemed to have a ring around it like saturn. If a lighted blimp was in the area that would fit but I don't know if there were any.
Summary: driving home tonight my wife and I saw an glowing object in the sky, it seem to have a ring around it kinda like saturn. It descended first then moved east we lost site as we were driving west. It wasn't a plane or helicopter.
